hibernate-mapping.sql-query:
select eosn.eosn_id, eosn.eosn_no, eosn.eosn_item_id, eooi.eooi_name, c.esus_user_name_cn as creator, eosn.create_time, m.esus_user_name_cn as modifier, eosn.modify_time from oms2b.eo_serial_no eosn left join oms2b.eo_order_item eooi on eosn.eosn_item_id = eooi.eooi_id left join oms2b.eo_order eoor on eoor.eoor_order_no = eooi.eooi_order_no left join es_user c on c.esus_id = eosn.creator left join es_user m on m.esus_id = eosn.modifier where 1 = 1 <<and eoor.eoor_order_no = :eoorOrderNo>> <<and eoor.eoor_logistic_no = :customerOrderNo>> <<and eosn.eosn_item_id = :commodityId>> <<and eosn.eosn_no = :eosnNo>>
${queryPlanDefinedSql} ${queryPlanSortSql}
